author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Historic Brierley Hill park entrance gates restored
text: Dudley Council has used Brierley Hill High Street Heritage Action Zone funding to repair the gates. The gates have stood at the Seagerâ€™s Lane and Church Street entrances to Marsh Park for more than 100 years. The council has been working with the Friends of Marsh Park on the project. It was opened in September 1921 in a grand ceremony led by Elsie Marsh.
